PositiveEntailmentTest.purpose: Test equivalent treatment of RDF constants and RIF symbols in simple entailment
PositiveEntailmentTest.description: The syntax for constants in RIF and RDF is slightly different; RDF has a number of different kinds of constants (e.g., IRI, in a literal, typed literal), whereas RIF has a single kind of constants (i.e., pairs <literal, symbol space>). In particular, in combinations, there is no distinction between plain literals and literals with type xs:string.
